headline: BNY Decreases Prime Lending Rate to 7.00%
summary: BNY (NYSE: BK), will decrease the Prime Lending Rate by 0.25%, from 7.25% to 7.00%, effective Thursday, October 30, 2025.

raw.headline: BNY Decreases Prime Lending Rate to 7.00%

headline: Securitize Rolls Out Tokenized Credit Fund with BNY on Ethereum
summary: The fund offers exposure to collateralized loan obligations, with onchain capital allocator Grove planning a $100 million anchor investment.
